attributes.action: Stop Royal Bank of Scotland paying the obscene bonuses to its senior staff immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the RBS is now 80% state owned its emoployees are effectively public service workers and therefore should be subject to the same remuneration restrictions as the rest of the public sector

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
